titles.title: Federal Infrastructure Flood Resiliency Act of 2017
Federal Infrastructure Flood Resiliency Act of 2017

To provide that the Executive order entitled "Establishing a Federal Flood Risk Management Standard and a Process for Further Soliciting and Considering Stakeholder Input" shall have the force and effect of law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Federal Infrastructure Flood Resiliency Act of 2017
This bill states that Executive Order 13690, titled "Establishing a Federal Flood Risk Management Standard and a Process for Further Soliciting and Considering Stakeholder Input," shall have the force and effect of law. The order includes provisions establishing a higher elevation standard than previously required.
